name: The Shmup
description:
Hello!

so I recently decided to begin my journey with Pico8, without knowing where to start I started following a tutorial by Lazy Devs Academy on Youtube, now obviously I won't be solely posting the result of my follow-along as anyone can do that, what I'm going to post here is my take on the game and at the end, I want to have a different experience and have done my own spinoff on the genre.
